name: upstart
content:
upstart noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
disapproving a person, especially a young one, who has suddenly got power or an important position and takes advantage of this in an unpleasant way

a new competitor: Larger drug companies are buying up many of the upstart companies.
